meanings.definition: To cause (someone) to remember someone or something.
meanings.sent1: My mom reminded me to take out the trash.
meanings.sent2: The alarm clock reminded me to wake up for school.
meanings.sent3: The sticky note reminded me to buy milk at the store.
meanings.sent4: The old photograph reminded me of my childhood days.
meanings.sent5: The song reminded me of our fun road trip last summer.

meanings.definition: To cause (someone) to think about something again.
meanings.sent1: The movie reminded me of my favorite book.
meanings.sent2: The smell of fresh cookies reminded me of my grandma's baking.
meanings.sent3: The funny joke reminded me of the time we laughed until we cried.
meanings.sent4: The sight of the ocean reminded me of the vastness of the world.
meanings.sent5: The sound of rain reminded me of cozy days spent indoors.
